Title: Pictures of four seasons in the rural village (2)
Designer: Xu Yongxiang (徐永祥)Lin Kangnian (林康年)Wu Delong (吳德隆)Yao Qiaoyun (姚巧云)
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: Second of four scrolls showing a rural village during the four seasons. This is summer. A water pump is installed, rice is planted, peasants are spreading manure and spraying pesticide, and in the background are three ox-driven water wheels.
